rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with natural light, featuring traditional Kerala motifs and stone finishes in keeping with Nalukettu design.
Open living space adjacent to the entrance hall, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles of east-facing openings.
A dining area integrated into the living space with adjoining kitchen facilities; open plan to promote connectivity and ease of access.
Modern traditional kitchen designed in Kerala style, equipped for efficient workflow while respecting local materials and design aesthetics.
A guest room located near the living area to provide privacy yet easy access; incorporates ample natural light with floor-to-ceiling windows in east-facing direction for positive energy as per Vastu.
Well-equipped bathroom attached to the guest room, featuring traditional Kerala design elements and water conservation features in keeping with sustainable practices.
Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side, designed according to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow and relaxation.
Additional bedroom integrated into a quiet area of the first floor with sufficient natural light from strategically placed openings.
Smaller bedroom designed for flexibility and ease of maintenance, following traditional Kerala styling.
Cozy study room situated near the master bedroom to encourage a peaceful working environment; includes natural lighting from east-facing windows.
Private bathroom for the first floor, designed with modern amenities and traditional Kerala aesthetics.
